data.md:MetaData: (Table 1) Abundances of H2O+, CO2, K2O, Rb and Sr and the isotope ratios of C, O, Sr and Nd in rocks of altered ocean crust from DSDP Hole 51-417D
43 cores, 508.6 m cored, 30.4 m drilled, 39.8 % recovery
Large scale isotopic Sr, Nd and O isotopic anatomy of altered oceanic crust: DSDP/ODP sites 417/418
